Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a value of $8,000 to you, just like it does to me. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discount, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
